titleStmt.title: A table of silver weight Cast us at the rates of 5 s. 8 d. 5. s 4 d. and 5 s. 2 d. from half a quarter of an ounce, to an hundred thousand ounces. By Tho. Oldfield, at the Exchequer, Westminster. 1696.
titleStmt.author: Oldfield, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tim. Goodwin at the Queen's-head against St. Dunstan's church, Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Magdalen College Library, Oxford.

place.placeName: the Queen's-head against St. Dunstan's church
